description: Numbers n such that least prime in Goldbach partition of n increases.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..69 (from Tomás Oliveira e Silva)
Jorg Richstein, Verifying Goldbach's Conjecture up to 4 * 10^14
Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
Tomás Oliveira e Silva, Goldbach conjecture verification
mathematica: p = 1; r = {}; Do[ k = 2; While[ !PrimeQ[k] || !PrimeQ[2n - k], k++ ]; If[k > p, p = k; r = Append[r, 2n]], {n, 2, 10^8}]; r
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 13 2002
